typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> NewProducts
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		EffectiveDate as timestamp,
		Active as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingProducts
source(output(
		maxkey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max (ProductID) as maxkey from dbo.DimProductsTable',
	format: 'query') ~> LookupMaxKey
NewProducts, FilterForActive exists(NewProducts@ProductID == ExistingProducts@ProductID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddKey
AddKey derive(Key = Key+toInteger(cacheKey#output().maxkey),
		Active = 1,
		ActiveStartTime = currentUTC(),
		ActiveEndTime = toTimestamp(toString(null()))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
FilterForActive, NewProducts exists(ExistingProducts@ProductID == NewProducts@ProductID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(Active = 0) ~> UpdateObsolete
MarkAsInsert, MarkAsUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
UpdateObsolete alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkAsUpdate
AddDimensionColumns alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkAsInsert
ExistingProducts filter(Active == 1) ~> FilterForActive
UnionAllData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		EffectiveDate as timestamp,
		Active as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimensionTableSink
LookupMaxKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> cacheKey
